name: Space Ranger (Charlie Atom)
description:
Team: Charlie Atom

- Some royalty free packs used: SciFi Props (for some backgrounds), Final Boss, Alien Babies (modified), Health and Energy pickup meshes and some sounds from Revealed Chiptune Pack (layered for making new SFX).

- Original characters, music and graphic design.

It's not a Metroidvania, it's not an arcade game, its a nostalgic sidescroller with some new elements from modern games to give you that vintage game vibe and also a futuristic one!

This demo offers one of the 10 levels that will be on the game, plus some easter eggs if you manage to pass it without dying once and many more stuff!
